name: zapier
title: Zapier
description: Trigger workflows from Zapier or let Zapier trigger your workflows to automate tasks and enhance your bot's capabilities.

event.title: Event from Zapier
event.description: This is called when a Zap sends an event to the Zapier webhook of your bot.

data.description: The data the Zapier action sent. Can be any string including JSON.
data.title: Event Data received from Zapier

correlationId.description: Can be used to correlate the response from Zapier when used with an `action.correlationId`

trigger.title: Send to Zapier
trigger.description: This sends a trigger to Zapier which you can use to start a Zap.

data.description: The data you want to send to Zapier trigger. Can be any string including JSON.
data.title: Trigger Data to send to Zapier

correlationId.description: Can be used to receive a response back from Zapier by listening for an `event.correlationId`

data.title: Trigger Data to send to Zapier
